title: Night of Excellence: All Black Affair
desc: The event will be a potluck banquet style event with performance and we ask everyone attending to dress to impress.   The main purpose of this event is to celebrate our diverse backgrounds with homegrown entertainment. The event will showcase a variety of foods from different ethnicities brought in by different organizations. During the event there will also be performances by a variety of artists alongside DJ Cali Cal. We ask that everyone attending bring a non perishable food item to donate to a local food bank.
